full_text: eu n tenho visto mt a glr falando, mas vai no postinho +  perto e toma logo a vacina de gripe! é de graça p todas as idades (viva o sus). So vejo todo mundo falando q ta gripado, c rinite, sinusite, covid... E NINGUEM TOMANDO VACINA ô carai 2 anos de pandemia n ensinaram nada?

texto_en: I haven't seen a lot of glr talking, but go to the health center + nearby and get the flu vaccine right away! and free for all ages (long live sus). I just see everyone saying they have the flu, rhinitis, sinusitis, covid... and no one taking a vaccine the constant_numerica years of a pandemic didn't teach anything?
